articles.title: Covid aid saved many from poverty: FM
articles.description: In the case of India, the report found that inflation in India would push 0% of the population below the poverty line of $1.90 per day, 0.02% of the population below the $3.30 per day and 0.04% of the population below the upper poverty line of $5.50 per day.
